    • Method Detail

      • buildPool

        public SqlProxyPool buildPool(Properties props)
        Opens a MySQL database connection pool connecting to JDBC_URL_TEST_LOCAL. Does not overwrite any given properties, i.e. if jdbcUrl is set to something other then JDBC_URL_TEST_LOCAL, that value will be preserved.
        Note that this pool has autoCommit set to false by default.
        Calls applyStableConnectionProps(Properties) for additional connection properties.
        Specified by:
        buildPool in interface IPoolBuilder

      • applyStableConnectionProps

        public static void applyStableConnectionProps(Properties props)
        Sets a collection of MySQL connection properties that help performance and stability (if a property is already set, the value is not overwritten). Note that the properties set a maximum of 5 minutes that a query can run, if this is no good, update the property connection.socketTimeout to an appropriate value (time in milliseconds).
